source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Unwrapping Techniques in Maya
items.headline: Unwrap like a Boss!
objectives_summary: The student will be able to properly unwrap a variety of models types/shapes both hard surface and organic in Maya 2018

items.title: Beginner's Guide to Stylized Character Creation for Games
items.headline: Learn to make a complete real time stylized character from start to finish with Abraham Leal.
objectives_summary: Stylized Character Modelling and Sculpting
Making the High poly character Game ready
Stylized Character Texturing in Substance Painter

items.title: Animation for Beginners in After Effects
items.headline: Get started in your Animation career with this basic intro to animating in After Effects
objectives_summary: Animation, Keyframing, Effects, importing, anchor points, Parenting

items.title: Game Asset Creation with Blender 2.8 & Substance Painter
items.headline: Learn how to model, texture and render a high quality game asset using Blender, Substance Painter & Marmoset Toolbag
objectives_summary: How to create Low and High poly version of asset inside Blender.
UV Unwraping in Blender.
Baking normal map in Substance Painter.

items.title: Comprehensive Guide & Walkthrough of 3D Printing
items.headline: Learn how to create your own business from the comfort of your own home through 3D printing technologies.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able to identify niche markets and create functional 3D designs (either yourself or by hiring a freelancer) for these markets.
You will also be able to list your product on various marketplaces and market it using some of today's most popular social media channels.
Finally, once you generate sales, you will be able to package and ship your products cost-efficiently.

items.title: Substance painter 2020 - The complete 3D Texturing course
items.headline: A complete introduction to 3D Texturing from beginner to intermediate using substance painter 2020
objectives_summary: substance painter UI and tools
Baking mesh maps
Procedural 3d texturing tools

items.title: Learn 2D Animation with Adobe Animate from Scratch
items.headline: Simple Animations with Adobe Animate
objectives_summary: Simple Animations with Adobe Animate
2D Animations

items.title: Master 3D, Create your own "Sylvanas" Vol.1 - body and head
items.headline: Understands the foundations of the Human Anatomy for the creation of high quality 3d characters.
objectives_summary: You’ll be introduced to techniques that will help you build up your characters correctly.
You’ll apply concepts about human body and head anatomy of Sylvanas.

items.title: Learning SketchUp Pro
items.headline: With layout and Style Builder
objectives_summary: Part 1:
1. Basic knowledge of SketchUp.
Creation of models.

items.title: Create an interactive, animated 3D face filter with Spark AR
items.headline: Learn to build, test and share a complex Instagram and Facebook face filter using Spark AR studio!
objectives_summary: Add 2D and 3D elements to your face (like hats!)
Learn what patches are, and how you can use them to add animation and interactivity to your filters
Test your face filter on your computer as well as on your own mobile device

items.title: Animate a Ninja in CrazyTalk Animator 3
items.headline: Learn how to apply the Animankenstein Formula in the animation of a Ninja performing some kicks
objectives_summary: You will learn how to animate any movement you want from watching references on YouTube and copying pose by pose
Create smooth animations without years of experience

items.title: Procreate Animation: Make fun GIFs and videos
items.headline: Learn How To Use Procreate as an Animation Tool
objectives_summary: Learn how to use Procreate as an animation tool
Learn how to create a short looping animation
Learn how to export GIFs and videos that work on Instagram and other social networks – using only your iPad

items.title: Professional Jewellery Design with Gemvision Matrix
items.headline: How to master 3d Jewellery design
objectives_summary: Create their own jewellery
Design and manufacture bespoke jewellery for companies or individuals
Use of Gemvision Matrix

items.title: An Introduction to Scripting in Maya

visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!
visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive

items.headline: Learn the basics of scripting for Autodesk's Maya using both MEL and Python
objectives_summary: Distinguish the difference between MEL and Python Scripting
Utilize the scripting reference
Understand MEL and Python Syntax

items.title: 3D Product Visualization in Cinema 4D - Energy Drink Poster
items.headline: Model a set of hyper realistic energy drink cans and create an awesome poster.
objectives_summary: Create a beautiful and hyper realistic 3D scene of a set of energy drink cans.
Create basic textures in Photoshop and apply them to their respective 3D objects.

items.title: Create Watercolor Story Video Slideshow in After Effects
items.headline: A step by step course;creating sketch watercolor slideshow using  After Effects -  After Effects Project File Included
objectives_summary: LEARN the techniques which you could then build on and create your own watercolor slideshows style using Adobe After Effects .
CREATE sketch watercolor story (Videos/Photos) slideshow using Adobe After Effects .
GET the After Effects project file and paint elements to work along with .
